alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 12:18AM CDT until March 23 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Boone County in central Missouri... Northwestern Audrain County in central Missouri... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Higbee, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sturgeon around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Centralia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
